description: Refurbishment of existing internal doors and windows to Stair Cores 1, 2 and 3 and along primary circulation, to improve fire safety and accessibility.
site_name: School Of Hygiene And Tropical Medicine
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
2023/1436/L: Erection of an extension to the existing lift core and stair, removal of dormer windows to mansard roof, replacement of roof plant on the roof of the Central Wing, and infilling of windows on the southern side elevation, internal works including extension to stairs in the southern core and replacement of internal doors all in association with the existing use.

2022/4935/P: Erection of an extension to the existing lift core and stair, removal of dormer windows to mansard roof, replacement of roof plant on the roof of the Central Wing, and infilling of windows on the southern side elevation all in association with the existing use.

2023/0759/L Modifications to the Gower Street and Malet Street moats to provide additional fire escape capacity from the Ground and Lower Ground Floor Levels

2022/0407/L Discharge of Condition 4 (Ref: 2019/3918/L),b) full details of proposed modifications to original doors along with any replacement doors including opening mechanism where needed.
